name: DebtEUR
body:
### Debt to GDP ratio in Europe:
The SVG files as well as the R code used for the project are available on my github page[Europe in Crisis](https://github.com/atmajitg/svg_europe). I have tried my best to explain how R can be used to manipulate the SVG files.

PLease feel free to visit my [website](https://atmajitgohil.com/2016/12/13/debt-to-gdp-ratio-r-and-svg/) and my [Blog](http://datavisualizationineconomics.blogspot.com/2016/12/debt-to-gdp-r-and-svg.html).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
